overview: It had to happen... we've all been wishing for it to happen... the ego collision between Boss Sexton and the East Coast Attitude kid Aryx Quinn. We all know Boss Sexton always gets what he wants. And in this case Mr Quinn. So he cast his web... for Quinn to come to L.A. for BIG bucks and all expenses paid and stardom. Boss Sexton knew Quinn simply could not resist.
title: The Arena 1
